# SEC Filings

  * [ November 25, 2024 - Senstar Annual General Meeting of Shareholders - Form 6-K ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-SEC-Filing-20241125-Form-6-K.pdf)

  * [ November 5, 2024 - Senstar Technologies Corporation Annual Meeting of Shareholders Proxy Statement ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-SEC-Filing-20241105-Form-6-K.pdf)

  * [ October 29, 2024 - Senstar Technologies to Report Third Quarter 2024 Results on Tuesday November 12, 2024 ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-SEC-Filing-20241029-Form-6-K.pdf)

  * [ August 27, 2024 - Senstar Technologies Reports Second Quarter 2024 Results ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-SEC-Filing-20240827-Form-6-K.pdf)

  * [ August 15, 2024 - Senstar Technologies to Report Second Quarter 2024 Results on Monday August 26, 2024 ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-SEC-Filing-20240815-Form-6-K.pdf)

  * [ May 29, 2024 – SEC Form SD for Fiscal Year Ending Dec 31, 2023 ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-SEC-Filing-20240529-Form-SD.pdf)

  * [ April 19, 2024 – Senstar Technologies Corporation Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2023 Financial Results ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-SEC-Filing-20240419-C-Senstar-Technologies-Corporation-Reports-Fourth-Quarter-and-Full-Year-2023-Financial-Results.pdf)

  * [ April 19, 2024 – 2023 Form 20-F ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-SEC-Filing-20240419-B-2023-Form-20-F.pdf)

  * [ March 18, 2024 – Senstar Technologies Completes Corporate Redomiciliation from Israel to Canada ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-SEC-Filing-20240318-Senstar-Technologies-Completes-Corporate-Redomiciliation.pdf)

# Press Releases

[ ![](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Press-Release-1-2-950x535.jpg) ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-Press-Release-2024-11-12-Senstar-Technologies-Reports-Third-Quarter-2024-Financial-Results.pdf)

##  [Senstar Technologies Reports Third Quarter 2024 Financial Results](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-Press-Release-2024-11-12-Senstar-Technologies-Reports-Third-Quarter-2024-Financial-Results.pdf)

Ottawa, Ontario, November 12, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Senstar Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: SNT), a leading international provider of comprehensive physical, video and access control security products and solutions, today announced its financial…

Ottawa, Ontario, August 26, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Senstar Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: SNT), a leading international provider of comprehensive physical, video and access control security products and solutions, today announced its financial…

##  [Senstar Technologies Reports First Quarter 2024 Financial Results](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Senstar-Technologies-Press-Release-2024-06-13-Senstar-Technologies-Reports-First-Quarter-2024-Financial-Results.pdf)

# In The News

#### June 2024

Protector Magazine – Die Notwendigkeit, kritische Infrastrukturen zu schützen, darf nicht unterschätzt werden. Bereits geringfügige Betriebsstörungen können weitreichende soziale und wirtschaftliche Auswirkungen haben. 

[ Read article ](https://senstarcorpdev.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/Aritkel-Kritis-technologisch-sichern-06.2024.pdf)

#### November 2023

Tank Storage Magazine: Protecting Critical Infrastructure - Molly Cooper investigates how tank terminal operators can protect their staff and assets from terrorism and security threats.

[ Read article ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/Tank-Storage-Magazine-Autumn-2023-Protecting-Critical-Infrastructure.pdf)

#### March 2023

GIT Magazine–Sensor- und Informationsmanagementsysteme zum Schutz von Infrastrukturen und Einrichtungen

[ Read article ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/git-security-article-march-2023-DE.pdf)

#### September 2022

Brad Martin, Director of Product Management, Senstar, describes how next-generation sensing technologies along the perimeter can work together via a sensor fusion engine to provide the highest level of intrusion detection while virtually eliminating all nuisance alarms.

[ Read article ](https://edition.pagesuite-professional.co.uk/html5/reader/production/default.aspx?pubname=&edid=84e33549-c3b3-4f8d-8059-d141a1c37afe&pnum=90)

#### August 2022

ASMAG–Data centers are the engine that drives the digital economy. Uninterrupted, continuous operation is critical to maintaining the services that an always-connected society relies on. 

[ Read article ](https://www.asmag.com/showpost/33041.aspx)

#### December 2021

ASMAG–Sensor fusion is one of five technologies that are hot in perimeter security now.

[ Read article ](https://www.asmag.com/showpost/32680.aspx?fbclid=iwar3czewyvy77xwipk7juzd8c6acuugfviyascd6bapgm4kzlfjioriuki2y)

#### August 2021

Electricity Forum–The physical security of electrical generation, transmission, and distribution sites is critical. This article looks at reducing nuisance alarm rates from on-site security systems.

[ Read article ](https://www.electricity-today.com/electrical-substation/physical-security-monitoring/reducing-nuisance-alarm-rates-from-on-site-security-systems)

#### February 2021

CIP Association—Critical infrastructure sites are constantly at risk of vandalism, theft and attack. Protection of these sites starts at the perimeter.

[ Read article ](https://cip-association.org/critical-infrastructure-protection-starts-at-the-perimeter/)

#### December 2020

SuperbCrew.com—Senstar: Four Decades Of Delivering Perimeter Security, Video Analytics And Video Management Solutions. A company overview with SVP and COO Jeremy Weese.

[ Read article ](https://www.superbcrew.com/senstar-four-decades-of-delivering-perimeter-security-video-analytics-and-video-management-solutions/)

#### November 2020

Tank Storage—Perimeter intrusion detection sensors combined with video analytics and intelligent lighting can dramatically enhance detection, deterrence and response capabilities while meeting budgetary constraints and operational realities.

[ Read article ](https://senstar.com/wp-content/uploads/2020_11_Senstar_in_the_news_Tank_Storage.pdf)

#### October 2020

Utility Magazine—A utility company turned to Senstar to help protect its sites, meet regulatory requirements, and accomplish overall physical security goals. 

[ Read article ](https://utilitymagazine.com.au/utility-company-counts-on-senstar-to-address-regulations-and-meet-security-goals/)

#### July 2020

ASMAG.com—Concerns and solutions for deploying crowd detection in public spaces. Responsibly and reliably deploying a crowd detection system in public spaces is of paramount importance. 

[ Read article ](https://www.asmag.com/showpost/31678.aspx)

Globally, the Need for Physical Security is Rapidly Rising
• Increased complex infrastructure vulnerability to terrorists, activists,
sabotage, geopolitical threats, vandalism, and theft.
• Rising need to protect people, environment and economies from
threats to critical infrastructure.
• Increasingly regulatory requirements for critical infrastructure.
